name: The Adventure of Blobbi
description:
This is a small jump'n'run about a small slime and some evil mushroom slimes!

And pinchy bugs!

It consists of 4 level and was made by 2 people.

We would be happy for any feedback because this is our first small game and we wanted to try a jump'n'run. Also we are planning on creating more games that will get better and better.

Use A and D to move, Space to jump and W to use the teleporters!
